title: Increased D caused increase Q in goldfish market

content.prompt: The market for goldfish is perfectly competitive. From year 1 to year 2, both the price and the quantity of goldfish sold increase. This is most likely caused by

choices.label: a decrease in both the demand and the supply

topic.text: 2.7: Market Disequilibrium and Changes in Equilibrium

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
